tool_description: Schedules package pickups with carriers and manages pickup appointments for return shipments.

carrier.description: Carrier for pickup: ups, fedex, usps, dhl

pickup_address.description: Complete address where pickup will occur

contact_name.description: Name of person available for pickup

time_window.description: Preferred time window: morning, afternoon, evening, anytime

total_weight.description: Total weight of all packages in pounds

tracking_numbers.description: Tracking numbers for packages being picked up

error_messages: Invalid carrier: Use one of [ups, fedex, usps, dhl].
Invalid pickup date: Pickup date must be at least 1 business day in advance.
Invalid time window: Use one of [morning, afternoon, evening, anytime].
Package count mismatch: Number of tracking numbers must match package_count.
Weight exceeds limits: Total weight exceeds carrier pickup limits.
Invalid phone format: Phone number must be in valid format with area code.
Pickup unavailable: Carrier does not service the specified pickup address.
usage: Provide pickup location, contact information, preferred timing, and package details to schedule carrier pickup.

pickup_fee.description: Cost for pickup service if applicable

cancellation_deadline.description: Deadline for canceling or modifying pickup
